concept.title: Digitizer Driver
concept.shortdesc: The Digitizer Driver is a kernel extension that manages digitizers (touch screens).

conbody.p: Graphic User Interface (GUI) that accept input from a pen or a stylus must implement the driver. This section describes how to create a port of it for your phone hardware.
Symbian platform provides a generic Platform Independent Layer for the driver. You must provide a Platform Specific Layer to implement the interface to the digitizer hardware on your phone.
